description: Gets details for a mail domain, including domain records required to configure your domain with recommended security.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization for which the domain is retrieved.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain from which you want to retrieve details.

nested_items.name: Records
nested_items.description: A list of the DNS records that WorkMail recommends adding in your DNS provider for the best user experience. The records configure your domain with DMARC, SPF, DKIM, and direct incoming email traffic to SES. See admin guide for more details.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The RFC 1035 record type. Possible values: CNAME, A, MX.

nested_items.name: Hostname
nested_items.description: The DNS hostname.- For example, domain.example.com.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value returned by the DNS for a query to that hostname and record type.

nested_items.name: IsTestDomain
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the domain is a test domain provided by WorkMail, or a custom domain.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the domain is the default domain for your organization.

nested_items.name: OwnershipVerificationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the domain ownership verification.

nested_items.name: DkimVerificationStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of a DKIM verification.
